text:
[Verse]
Walking down this empty street
In the night where spirits meet
Feel the rhythm in my feet
Chasing shadows can't be beat

[Verse 2]
Moonlight shining in my eyes
Whispers of the night are lies
Heartbeat racing no surprise
We're after dreams that never die

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the dark
Running free
It’s just a spark
In the night
We leave our mark
Echoes ringing
How we hark

[Verse 3]
Neon lights they guide our way
Through the mist and into day
Lost and found in life's ballet
Every move
A bold display

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the dark
Running free
It’s just a spark
In the night
We leave our mark
Echoes ringing
How we hark

[Bridge]
Every shadow tells a tale
In the mist
We never fail
Love and laughter in the gale
Journey endless
Set the sail
title: Chasing Shadows
